welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monmouth Junction, a charming city known for its historical landmarks, lively culture, and friendly community. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that this city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all domestic flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves as the gateway for all international flights and offers a range of services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'TTN Free Wifi' in their device's wifi settings.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for several airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for several airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for several airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Doylestown Airport offers luxury amenities for private jet travelers, including a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
